Text.val: 14.03.2013 GB SCR17995 Replaced screen button load logic by GB901
22.03.2012 SH SCR17182 Replaced GM900 by GB900 (program permission)
12.05.2011 SH SCR16448 Removed GNRL_CURRENCY (was not used)
29.08.2007 SH SCR12856 OPH403B Removed test on BTCH_DATE =< v.DATE
26.06.2006 AK SCR11522 CHQE_AMOUNTCURRGNRL instead of using GB002 in OPH430B
20.06.2006 JJ SCR11475 B Changed selection on BTCH_CASHREPORTDATE to BTCH_DATE
... Button text with '-', '*' or .... inside text
... Button text without '-', '*' or .... inside text
... if "List of file" or "List of drafts per date" is selected, then date is
OPH403A List of booked cheques per day

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Sequence number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Cheque number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Currency')&';'&MlsTrans ('Amount')&';'&MlsTrans ('Admin number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Client number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Bank admin number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Bank ledger number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Date money received')

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select CHQE_ID, CHQE_ADMNO, CHQE_CLNTNO, CHQE_CHEQUENUMBER, CHQU_CURRENCY, CHQE_AMOUNTCURRCHEQUE, CHQE_CHQU_UNITDATE, CHQE_DATEMONEYRECEIVED, CHQE_BTCP_BTCH_ID, CHQE_BTCP_LINENO, CHQE_AMOUNTCURRGNRL from :1/CHQE, :1/CHQU
where CHQE_CHQU_ID = CHQU_ID and CHQE_CHQU_UNITDATE <=':2' and (CHQE_DATEMONEYRECEIVED is null or CHQE_DATEMONEYRECEIVED > ':2') and CHQU_BPH240STARTED = 'Y' order by CHQE_ADMNO, CHQE_CLNTNO, CHQU_CURRENCY, CHQE_CHQU_UNITDATE
for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

Text.val: .. perfrom a page break before start printing lines for next administration
(INFO: Page = Top, see output form below))

SQL_STMT_U.val:
select CHQE_ID, CHQE_ADMNO, CHQE_CLNTNO, CHQE_CHEQUENUMBER, CHQU_CURRENCY, CHQE_AMOUNTCURRCHEQUE, CHQE_CHQU_UNITDATE, CHQE_DATEMONEYRECEIVED, CHQE_BTCP_BTCH_ID, CHQE_BTCP_LINENO, CHQE_AMOUNTCURRGNRL from :1/CHQE, :1/CHQU
where CHQE_CHQU_ID = CHQU_ID and CHQE_CHQU_UNITDATE <=':2' and (CHQE_DATEMONEYRECEIVED is null or CHQE_DATEMONEYRECEIVED > ':2') and CHQU_BPH240STARTED = 'Y' order by CHQE_ADMNO, CHQE_CLNTNO, CHQU_CURRENCY, CHQE_CHQU_UNITDATE
for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Admin number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Client number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor Heller number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Debtor Client number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Name debtor')&';'&MlsTrans ('Cheque number')&';'&MlsTrans ('Currency')&';'&MlsTrans ('Amount cheque currency')
Trim ({9,4})&';'&MlsTrans ('Amount general currency')&';'&MlsTrans ('Date received')&';'&MlsTrans ('Date money received')
MlsTrans ('Total cheques office')&';'&MlsTrans ('Office')&';'&Trim (Str ({0,2},'4'))&';'&';'&';'&';'&';'&MlsTrans ('Total amount general currency')&';'&Trim (Str ({0,18},'N11.2C'))
